SELECT cyear,cmonth, MAX( CASE procKey WHEN 'comprehensiveManage' THEN csum ELSE 0 END ) comprehensiveManage, MAX( CASE procKey WHEN 'LawEnforcementProcess' THEN csum ELSE 0 END ) LawEnforcementProcess FROM ( SELECT cyear,cmonth,procKey, SUM(ccount) csum FROM( SELECT YEAR(cmonth) cyear, MONTH(cmonth) cmonth, PROC_KEY procKey, COUNT(PROC_KEY) ccount FROM ( SELECT swp1.PROC_INST_ID, swpt1.PROC_KEY, FROM_UNIXTIME(MAX(swpt1.PROC_TASK_ENDTIME),'%Y/%m/%d') cmonth FROM SCP_WF_PROC swp1 LEFT JOIN (
SELECT * FROM SCP_WF_PROC_TASK swpt1 WHERE YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(swpt1.PROC_TASK_ENDTIME,'%Y/%m/%d'))=YEAR(NOW()) ) swpt1 ON swp1.PROC_INST_ID = swpt1.PROC_INST_ID WHERE swp1.PROC_STATUS IN (4, 6) AND swpt1.PROC_TASK_ASSIGNEE = #{procTaskAssignee} GROUP BY swp1.PROC_INST_ID, swpt1.PROC_KEY ) wftask GROUP BY cmonth, PROC_KEY ) ccountTmp GROUP BY cmonth,procKey,cyear ) sumTmp GROUP BY cmonth,cyear

SELECT task.PROC_CTASKNAME procCtaskname, task.PROC_INST_ID procInstId, task.PROC_CTASKID procCtaskId, task.PROC_BIZID procBizid FROM SCP_WF_PROC_TASK task WHERE task.PROC_TASK_STATUS IN ('1', '2') AND task.PROC_KEY=#{prockey}
AND task.PROC_CTASKNAME = #{procCtaskname}

SELECT task.PROC_CTASKNAME procCtaskname, task.PROC_INST_ID procInstId, task.PROC_CTASKID procCtaskId, task.PROC_BIZID procBizid FROM SCP_WF_PROC_TASK task WHERE task.ID IN ( SELECT MAX(swpt.id) FROM SCP_WF_PROC_TASK swpt WHERE swpt.PROC_KEY=#{prockey} GROUP BY swpt.PROC_INST_ID )
and task.PROC_CTASKNAME = #{procCtaskname}

SELECT count(task.PROC_CTASKID) FROM SCP_WF_PROC proc JOIN SCP_WF_PROC_TASK task ON proc.PROC_INST_ID = task.PROC_INST_ID LEFT JOIN SCP_WF_PROC_DELEGATE delegate ON delegate.PROC_INST_ID = proc.PROC_INST_ID AND delegate.PROC_MANDATARY = #{procTaskUser} AND delegate.PROC_LICENSE_ISVALID = '1' WHERE proc.PROC_STATUS = '0' AND task.PROC_TASK_STATUS IN ('1', '2') AND ( ( task.PROC_TASK_STATUS = '1' AND (
task.PROC_TASK_GROUP in
#{item}
OR
delegate.PROC_MANDATARY=#{procTaskUser} and task.PROC_TASK_GROUP=delegate.PROC_LICENSOR_ROLE ) ) OR ( task.PROC_TASK_STATUS = '2' AND task.PROC_TASK_ASSIGNEE = #{procTaskUser} ) ) AND ( task.PROC_DATAPERMISSION = '0' OR task.PROC_DATAPERMISSION = '1' AND proc.PROC_ORGCODE = #{procOrgCode} OR task.PROC_DATAPERMISSION = '2' AND SUBSTR(proc.PROC_ORGCODE, 1, LENGTH(#{procOrgCode}))=#{procOrgCode} and LENGTH(proc.PROC_ORGCODE) > LENGTH(#{procOrgCode}) OR task.PROC_DATAPERMISSION = '3' AND SUBSTR(proc.PROC_ORGCODE, 1, LENGTH(#{procOrgCode}))=#{procOrgCode} OR task.PROC_DATAPERMISSION = '9' AND task.PROC_APPOINT_USERS = #{procTaskUser}) AND (task.PROC_TENANTPERMISSION = '0' OR task.PROC_TENANTPERMISSION = '1' and proc.PROC_TENANT_ID = #{procTenantId}) AND (task.PROC_ORGPERMISSION = '0' OR task.PROC_ORGPERMISSION = '1' and task.PROC_ORGCODE = #{procOrgCode} OR task.PROC_ORGPERMISSION = '2' and (task.PROC_ORGCODE = #{procOrgCode} or
task.PROC_ORGCODE in
#{item}
) OR task.PROC_ORGPERMISSION = '3' and
task.PROC_ORGCODE in
#{item}
OR task.PROC_ORGPERMISSION = '9' task.PROC_APPOINT_USERS = #{procTaskUser}) AND (task.PROC_DEPTPERMISSION = '0' OR task.PROC_DEPTPERMISSION = '1' and task.PROC_DEPART_ID = #{procDeptId}) AND (task.PROC_SELFPERMISSION1 = '0' OR task.PROC_SELFPERMISSION1 = '1' and task.PROC_SELFDATA1 = #{procSelfPermissionData1}) AND (task.PROC_SELFPERMISSION2 = '0' OR task.PROC_SELFPERMISSION2 = '1' and task.PROC_SELFDATA2 = #{procSelfPermissionData2}) AND (task.PROC_SELFPERMISSION3 = '0' OR task.PROC_SELFPERMISSION3 = '1' and task.PROC_SELFDATA3 = #{procSelfPermissionData3}) AND (task.PROC_SELFPERMISSION4 = '0' OR task.PROC_SELFPERMISSION4 = '1' and task.PROC_SELFDATA4 = #{procSelfPermissionData4}) AND (task.PROC_SELFPERMISSION5 = '0' OR task.PROC_SELFPERMISSION5 = '1' and task.PROC_SELFDATA5 = #{procSelfPermissionData5})
and proc.PROC_NAME LIKE "%"#{procName}"%"
and task.PROC_CTASKNAME LIKE "%"#{procCtaskname}"%"
and proc.PROC_MEMO LIKE "%"#{procMemo}"%"
and task.PROC_TASK_STATUS = #{procTaskStatus}
and proc.PROC_BIZID LIKE "%"#{procBizid}"%"
ORDER BY task.PROC_TASK_COMMITTIME ASC

SELECT delegate.PROC_INST_ID procInstId, proc.PROC_NAME procName, proc.PROC_BIZID procBizId, proc.PROC_BIZTYPE procBiztype, proc.PROC_MEMO procMemo, proc.PROC_ORGCODE procOrgcode, proc.PROC_DISPLAYURL procDisplayurl, delegate.PROC_LICENSOR procLicensor, delegate.PROC_MANDATARY procMandatary, FROM_UNIXTIME( delegate.PROC_LICENSE_TIME, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s' ) procLicenseTime, FROM_UNIXTIME( proc.PROC_CREATETIME, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s' ) procCreatetime, FROM_UNIXTIME( proc.PROC_ENDTIME, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s' ) procEndtime, proc.PROC_STATUS procStatus, CASE proc.PROC_STATUS WHEN '0' THEN '审批中' WHEN '3' THEN '已暂停' ELSE '未知' END AS procStatusName FROM SCP_wf_proc_delegate delegate LEFT JOIN SCP_wf_proc proc ON proc.PROC_INST_ID = delegate.PROC_INST_ID WHERE delegate.PROC_LICENSE_ISVALID = '1' and proc.PROC_TENANT_ID = #{procTenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND delegate.PROC_LICENSOR = #{procTaskUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND proc.PROC_STATUS in ('0', '3') ORDER BY proc.PROC_CREATETIME DESC, delegate.PROC_LICENSE_TIME ASC
SELECT PROC_INST_ID procInstId, PROC_BIZID procBizId FROM SCP_WF_PROC_TASK WHERE PROC_KEY = #{procKey} AND PROC_BIZID IN (${procBizId}) GROUP BY PROC_INST_ID, PROC_BIZID

SELECT PROC_INST_ID procInstId, PROC_BIZID procBizId, # PROC_CTASKNAME procCtaskName, PROC_CTASKID procCtaskId, PROC_TASK_STATUS procTaskStatus, PROC_KEY procKey, FROM_UNIXTIME(PROC_TASK_COMMITTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') procTaskCommittime FROM SCP_WF_PROC_TASK WHERE PROC_CTASKID=#{procTaskId}

SELECT proc.PROC_ID procId, proc.PROC_KEY procKey, proc.PROC_NAME procName, proc.PROC_INST_ID procInstId, proc.PROC_BIZID procBizid, proc.PROC_BIZTYPE procBiztype, proc.PROC_ORGCODE procOrgcode, proc.PROC_MEMO procMemo, task.PROC_TASK_STATUS procTaskStatus, task.PROC_TASK_PROPERTIES procTaskProperties, CASE WHEN task.PROC_TASK_STATUS = '1' THEN '待签收' WHEN task.PROC_TASK_STATUS = '2' THEN '待处理' WHEN task.PROC_TASK_STATUS = '3' THEN '已处理' WHEN task.PROC_TASK_STATUS = '4' THEN '已终止' ELSE '未知' END procTaskStatusName, task.ID id, task.PROC_CTASKID procCtaskId, task.PROC_CTASKCODE procCtaskcode, task.PROC_CTASKNAME procCtaskname, task.PROC_TASK_COMMITTER procTaskCommitter, task.PROC_APPROVEURL procApproveurl, task.PROC_SELF_PROPERTIES procSelfProperties, task.PROC_TASK_ASSIGNEE procTaskAssignee,
task.PROC_LICENSOR procLicensor, FROM_UNIXTIME(task.PROC_TASK_COMMITTIME, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') procTaskCommittime, FROM_UNIXTIME(task.PROC_TASK_ASSIGNTIME, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') procTaskAssigntime, task.PROC_REFUSETASK procRefusetask FROM SCP_WF_PROC proc JOIN SCP_WF_PROC_TASK task ON proc.PROC_INST_ID = task.PROC_INST_ID LEFT JOIN SCP_WF_PROC_DELEGATE delegate ON delegate.PROC_INST_ID = proc.PROC_INST_ID AND delegate.PROC_MANDATARY = #{procTaskUser} AND delegate.PROC_LICENSE_ISVALID = '1' WHERE proc.PROC_STATUS = '0' AND task.PROC_TASK_STATUS IN ('1', '2') AND task.PROC_KEY=#{procKey} AND task.PROC_BIZID=#{procBizId} ORDER BY task.PROC_TASK_COMMITTIME ASC
